title: Your Pet is Welcome at Aster Meadow Apartments! Pet-Friendly 1 bed, 1 bath!
neighborhood: Vadnais Heights - Near Bridgewood Park & White Bear Lake
posting_body: ['Come and see what the fuss is all about at Aster Meadow Apartments, located at 4143-4145 Centerville Rd Vadnais Heights, MN 55127.', 'Description', '........', 'Aster Meadow luxury apartments is a brand new building that offers the perfect balance of sophisticated lifestyle and prime location in Vadnais Heights.', 'Our spacious living arrangements combine luxurious comfort with first-class amenities -
